Name: KEIKA - A Puzzle Adventure
About the game: Check out this puzzle / reflection game developed by YukiOstudio that will ask you to help KEIKA restore its world. Complete the various levels using a limited number of interactive elements that will allow KEIKA to: - Change direction - Jump - Activate switches - Recover keys - and other
